Author: thoughtfulfox
Text: Unfortunately, you can be exceedingly sick at all calorie levels. I was certainly sick when I ate 200 calories a day for a couple weeks before binging on 10k. I was probably my most sick when eating between 12-1700 calories a day and obviously underweight. And I’m still sick now that I’m not counting calories, have gained more weight than I needed to (upper healthy BMI) and am having regular binges.  All these numbers in our heads don’t mean what we think they do. No number will ever make us “unsick”...only we can do that and it’s damn hard. My inbox is always open if you need to talk.
